register.description: Front End H.264 sequence-level parameters (from a Sequence Parameter Set). This contains similar parameters to the register BE_SPS0

bitfield.description: Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - chroma_format_idc, for MSVDX Core &gt;= 6
Specifies the bit depth of the samples of the chroma arrays for Core Revisions &gt; 6.0.0
Specifies the bit depth of the samples of the luma arrays for Core Revisions &gt; 6.0.0
Indicates that the slice group map in VEC_H264_FE_BASE_ADDR_SGM is packed every 4 bits, rather than 8 bits
When H.264 profile is 3.1 or greater, this bit shall be set to 1
Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - direct_8x8_inference_flag
Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - chroma_format_idc
Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - frame_mbs_only_flag
Picture Width in [macroblocks - 1]

register.description: Front End H.264 picture-level parameters (from a Picture Parameter Set). This contains similar parameters to the register BE_PPS0

bitfield.description: Picture parameter set RBSP syntax - num_slice_groups_minus1
Picture parameter set RBSP syntax - constrained_intra_pred_flag
Picture parameter set RBSP syntax - transform_8x8_mode_flag

register.description: Front End H.264 picture-level parameters (from a Slice Header) describing the current picture. This contains similar parameters to the register BE_CUR_PIC0

bitfield.description: Picture size in [macroblocks - 1]
Picture Height in [macroblocks - 1]
Slice header syntax - field_pic_flag
Slice header syntax - bottom_field_flag

register.description: Front End H.264 slice-level parameters (from a Slice Header). This contains similar parameters to the register BE_SLICE0

bitfield.description: MSVDX slice type:
Slice header syntax - cabac_init_idc
Slice count.

register.description: Front End H.264 slice-level parameters (from a Slice Header). This contains similar parameters to the register BE_SLICE1

bitfield.description: The macroblock address of the first macroblock in the slice in Y axis
The macroblock address of the first macroblock in the slice in X axis
Slice header syntax - num_ref_idx_l1_active_minus1
Slice header syntax - num_ref_idx_l0_active_minus1

register.description: Front End H.264 base address for the 'map unit to slice group map' for the current picture. This base address will only be valid if the value of 'num_slice_groups_minus1' in the register FE_PPS0 is greater than 0

bitfield.description: mapUnitToSliceGroupMap data structure base address
Slice header syntax - first_mb_in_slice
Spare bits for other codec registers
Activate specific logic to cope with x264 divergence from the h.264 specification:

register.description: Enable/disable different points in Entropy parse to detect potential errors during decode. Some of these error detection procedures may cause different issues with some no fully compliant streams.

bitfield.description: Enable/disable error detection when the last slice overrun the picture size.
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits
Spare bits

register.description: Back End H.264 sequence-level parameters (from a Sequence Parameter Set) stored after passing through Rendec. This register contains similar parameters to the register FE_SPS0

bitfield.description: Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - chroma_format_idc, for MSVDX Core &gt;= 6
Specifies the bit depth of the samples of the chroma arrays for Core Revisions &gt; 6.0.0
Specifies the bit depth of the samples of the luma arrays for Core Revisions &gt; 6.0.0
Indicates the stream supports Lossless Macroblocks.
Indicates that IQ should use it's default scaling matricies
Indicates that the current sequence may contain non-consecutive MBs
ProfileIdc [for IQ]:
When H.264 profile is 3.1 or greater, this bit shall be set to 1
Direct 8x8 inference flag
Sequence parameter set RBSP syntax - chroma_format_idc
Picture width in [macroblocks - 1]

register.description: Back End H.264 picture-level parameters (from a Picture Parameter Set) stored after passing through Rendec. This register contains similar parameters to the register FE_PPS0

bitfield.description: Chroma Qp index offset
Weighted_bipred_idc for the current picture
Constrained intra prediction flag for the current picture

register.description: Back End H.264 picture-level parameters (from a Slice Header) describing the current picture, stored after passing through Rendec. This contains similar parameters to the register FE_CUR_PIC0

bitfield.description: Picture height in [macroblocks - 1]
Reference flag for the current picture
Field pic flag for the current picture
Bottom field flag for the current picture

register.description: Back End H.264 slice-level parameters (from Slice Header) stored after passing through Rendec. This register contains similar parameters to the register FE_SLICE0

bitfield.description: Direct_spatial_mv_pred_flag for the current picture
Specifies the offset used in accessing the alpha and tco deblocking filter tables for filtering operations controlled by the macroblocks within the slice.
Specifies the offset used in accessing the beta deblocking filter tables for filtering operations controlled by the macroblocks within the slice.
SLICE_FIELD_TYPE of the Operating Mode Command
MSVDX slice type:
SliceCount - increments from 0 for each slice in currPic

register.description: Back End H.264 slice-level parameters (from Slice Header) stored after passing through Rendec. This contains similar parameters to the register FE_SLICE1

bitfield.description: The macroblock address of the first macroblock in the slice in Y coordinate
The macroblock address of the first macroblock in the slice in X coordinate
Slice QPY for the current picture

register.description: Back End H.264 base address for the macroblock parameters to be stored for the current picture

bitfield.description: currPic parameters base address

register.description: Back End H.264 long term reference picture status flags for each picture in the Decoded Picture Buffer. Stored after passing through Rendec

bitfield.description: Long term frame flag for each reference frame in the Decoded Picture Buffer

register.description: Back End H.264 colocated picture parameters. This register contains similar parameters to the registers FE_CUR_PIC0 and BE_CUR_PIC0. However, the parameters for the colocated picture can change per slice

bitfield.description: Should be set when RefPicList1{0} is an inter view prediction reference.
Flag set if colocated picture is a field pair not a frame
Mbaff frame flag for colocated picture
When VEC_H264_BE_CUR_PIC0 BE_FIELD_PIC_FLAG =

register.description: Back End H.264 base address to read the macroblock parameters for the colocated picture. This address can change per slice

bitfield.description: Parameters base address for colocated picture

register.description: Reference picture list 0 inverse maps dpbIdx and bottom field flag to refIdx. This is used to determine refIdx_l0 in B temporal direct prediction. In frame mode, only the first 16 entries are used (ignoring bottom field flag). In field mode, the first 16 entires cover top fields and the second 16 entries cover bottom fields

register.description: Disable filter for X264 encoded lossless streams as needed.

bitfield.description: Disable the VDMC filter for 8x8 blocks on X264 encoded lossless streams.
